issues.description: The solution repository implements the farm‐singing functionality in a method named `playFarmSong()` instead of the `singFarmSong()` method declared in the template and specified in the problem statement. This name mismatch prevents students from correctly overriding and using the intended `singFarmSong()` API.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the solution method `playFarmSong()` to `singFarmSong()`, aligning the solution signature with the template and problem specification.

issues.description: The solution repository’s Farm class provides a method named playFarmSong(), whereas the problem statement and template repository define and refer to a method named singFarmSong(). This inconsistency will confuse students about which method to implement and cause mismatches with expected tests.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the solution’s playFarmSong() method to singFarmSong() (and update any calls to it) so that it matches the problem statement and template, or alternatively update the problem and template to use playFarmSong() consistently.
